column5: wondering if anybody knows were i can buy halibut pellets in eastern ontario...  im not talking about 1kg bags of dynamite hook baits  im looking for large bag like 20kg or bigger of small pellets ... 10mm or smaller...  i want them for use in pva bags and in my spod mix for carp fishing  thnx for any help fellas  mike
Look at koi carp specialists - they may have the kind of thing you're looking for. Alternatively see if you can find the dynamite distributor, they do big bags but not many shops stock them.
